io.werval.api.http

Interface HttpBuilders

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpBuildersSPI, WervalTestSupport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheTest, TemplatesTest, WervalRule, WervalTest 

    public interface HttpBuilders
    HTTP API Objects Builders.

    Use this to create instances of HTTP API Objects found in the io.werval.api.http package.

    Typically used in controllers and filters.

    All builders are immutable and reusable.

      Nested Classes

      static interface  HttpBuilders.CookieBuilder
      Cookie Builder.

        Returns:
